    • libdevice
    libdevice

    libdevice

    CUDAnative.jl provides wrapper functions for the mathematical routines in libdevice, CUDA's device math library. Many of these functions implement an interface familiar to similar functions in Base, but it is currently impossible to transparently dispatch to these device functions. As a consequence, users should prefix calls to math functions (eg. sin or pow) with the CUDAnative module name.

    WIP
